name: gardevoirite
effect: Held: Allows Gardevoir to Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir.
short_effect: Held: Allows Gardevoir to Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Gardevoir hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
